data.name: WTC : Relentless Protagonist [SxS]
data.detailed_description:
Relentless Protagonist is an interactive comedy/drama/thriller visual novel, set in a semi-fictional world of secret organisations.

Story

When the protagonist and Grendel Jinx are forced to work together to try and stop an enemy group, things don't go to plan and they manage to find themselves trapped in a school, where everyone believes they are transfer students.

After the initial shock, the pair gradually get to know their classmates, and things seem to be going well - at least for a short time.

However, it's not long before teachers and classmates alike are meeting violent ends. If neither the protagonist nor Grendel wants to become another casualty, a way out of their predicament is needed.

Will the protagonist and Grendel be able to solve the mystery ? Are the murders caused by invisible aliens called the 'Enemies Of Civilisation' or something more mundane ?

Features

  • Comedy/drama visual novel thriller, with scenes of graphic violence
  • Game choices affect the ending as well as which secondary story path to follow, with three different endings and two epilogues
  • Anime style characters
  • Internal and Steam achievements
  • 102 CG screens in total
  • 65,000+ word story, totally 6 - 8 hours play

Characters


With his/her parents held hostage, the protagonist is forced to work with Grendel Jinx to stop a weapon from causing untold damage


Grendel Jinx - a lazy, arrogant, anime-loving megalomaniacal kleptomaniac, she ends up working with the protagonist due to a slight accident involving 'The Council Of The Unseen' helicopters


Mrs. Jinx - divorced after certain events a few years previously, she now works for another group. She still involves herself with Grendels and the protagonist's life, though. Which isn't always appreciated.


Protagonists doting parents. They also harbour a secret

data.short_description: Grendel and her "friend" must work together to find a way out of a strange school, where pupils and teachers alike are being killed in mysterious circumstances. Can they both stay alive long enough to work out what is going on and escape ?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
  • Additional Notes: Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
  • Additional Notes: Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

data.legal_notice:
Character art by Larvinlucas
Background art by Mustikadewia
CG art by Mehwish Sher Ali
Addition art by Rebecca Dawson and Action VFX
Music by FilmMusic.io
Addition music by Pond5
Sound effects by EvantoMarket
Addition sound effects by Pond5 and Freesound.org
Title music : "Broken Sky" by JHL music
Title sequence/end credit music : "Houkai no hate no ishi" feat. GUMI

content_descriptors.notes:
Scenes of violence
Implied sexual assault
